Blackstorm:

Blackstorm nodded ans she moved towards a repairation tank, she 
walked close to a male, but she didn't payed atention to him. She 
choose a tank and come in. Soon, the tank was healing her wounds and 
she rested inside

> In a message dated 4/28/03 10:59:20 PM Central Daylight Time,

> 
> 
> > Blackstorm nodded and she tottered, following Maxima.
> > 
> 
> "Let's return to the CR Chamber. Rest there, recoop & repair." at 
the same 
> time she would check up upon Perceptor & Hydras' progress.
